Jargon Term: You will continue to take coumadin for 2 months and then will restart aspirin.
You will have a follow-up appointment with Dr. [**First Name (STitle) **] in 2 months.
Annotation: Aftercare instructions - Upcoming Schedules - Specialist appointment

Jargon Term: Please note the following changes to your medications: START: - coumadin (take for a total of 2 months, you will need your INR blood level checked regularly while on this medication)
Capsaicin cream for pain over knee
Clobetasol ointment 0.5% to affected areas (NOT on face, skin folds, arm pits or inner thighs)
Hydrocortisone cream to affected areas on face, skin folds and arm pits, inner thighs
STOP: - aspirin (you will restart this medication in 2 months after stopping coumadin)
